no_data_text: No Data Available in this Section
login_title: Login to access your travelwise  account
our_courses_text: Mobile servicing is a demanding platform in today's world. Learning Mangement Sytem is a reliable organization of mobile servicing. The videos of each of our classes are designed in such a way that you get the confidence to work on each section at the end of the course online as well as you can come to our lab for practical work at no extra charge (conditions apply).
popular_courses_text: Welcome to Learning Mangement Sytem, where our courses are meticulously crafted to meet the highest professional standards. Gain the knowledge, experience, and expertise that will propel you into your dream job in the global market. Enroll in our online or offline courses anytime, choosing from a diverse range of offerings. Your journey to success begins here.
success_story_text: The presence of our students in the ever expanding IT industry motivates us, drives us to guide more people towards a sustainable future.
special_service_text: Not just classes, Learning Mangement Sytem is always ready to support students in any need.
admission_going_title: Admission is ongoing for all courses
admission_going_subtitle: Every task in the course is given practically so that you can understand it very easily
admission_going_text: Enroll to any online or offline course now, take one step ahead towards a competent career
admission_going_text_2: You can enroll in any online course at your convenience now. You will also get any mobile phone flash file, MMC change file, CPU change file etc.
consultation_slider_text: Find your perfect course with Learning Mangement Sytem. Join our free seminars for expert guidance on choosing the ideal program that aligns with your interests and sets you on a path to exciting career opportunities. Your journey to success begins here.
practical_slider_text: The absence of practical training often renders any education incomplete, leaving technicians significantly disadvantaged with nearly 70% facing frustration due to the lack of hands-on learning. Transitioning to real work environments, be it in a marketplace or establishing personal shops, often leads to considerable failure, prompting many to exit the servicing sector and seek alternative employment opportunities. SK Info BD prioritizes practical training in all our courses, ensuring arrangements for hands-on work. By completing each class under the guidance of our adept instructors, participants gain a tangible understanding of the acquired expertise throughout the course duration.
technicians_slider_title: Trusted company in the world of making expert mobile technicians
technicians_slider_text: Learning Mangement Sytem is at your side to keep yourself expert in keeping up with modern technology. Whether in the country or abroad, mobile servicing experts are in good demand, that's why we have been creating mobile servicing expert technicians for more than a century with experienced teachers and modern labs. Till now, we have got hundreds of successful technicians who have become self-reliant and created employment. Our inspiration to follow more people and these successful technician brothers I believe there is talent hidden inside every human being and the responsibility to develop your hidden talent is all we need is your interest and regular practice.
success_report_title: Success reports of some of my student's work
footer_title: Admission is going for all Courses
footer_text: Enroll to any online or offline course now, take one step ahead towards a competent career
contact_title: Feel Free To Get In Touch
contact_sub: Join us as we set the foundation for a lifelong quest for understanding
you_may_be_thinking_to_work_online: You may be thinking, can I learn to work online?

its_not_late_to_make_career_decision: It's not too late to make a career decision. Those who are interested in learning enroll in the course at yourconvenience today.

password_text: Your previous password has been reseted. Please set a new password for your account.
success_student_text: Our successful students can contact our students for any service in the country and outside the country. Inshallah you will get a good advice or a good support.
blog_title: The best tools review our Learning Mangement Sytem

come_india: How to come to our lab from INDIA
come_india_text: You can contact us for any need, you can visit us directly, you can also call our whatsapp number and get any information related to training including training, you can also give a knock on Facebook messenger and you can easily come to us from 64 districts of Bangladesh.
comment_text: I believe every student of mine is a member of the Learning Mangement Sytem family. So any constructive suggestions from the students or correcting our mistakes would encourage us to move forward.

refund.title: Refund Policy
refund.refund_policy: Once your admission has confirmed then if you wanna to cancel your admission then you have to inform us within 48 Hours. If you are unable to inform us then you can not apply for cancellation admission or any refund.
refund.intro: Thanks for choosing. We are working to make you learn and work from your shop. We are working to build our website with quality courses, so that everyone can learn new updated work and become a successful technician in life. maybe.

refund.section_text_2: Having a standard fixed refund policy. Once a purchase decision is made, it is final and no refunds are issued. This policy is subject to this practice to ensure fairness and consistency for all our customers.

cancellation.title: Cancellation Policy
cancellation.intro: Thank you for choosing. We understand that you may need to cancel a course or service for any reason. Please review our cancellation policy here as described below.
cancellation.section_text_1: We strive to provide you with a smooth learning experience. We understand that plans may change and you may have to cancel your course or service.
cancellation.section_text_2_1: To initiate a cancellation, please follow these steps:
cancellation.section_text_2_3: state your full name, order number and which course or service you wish to cancel.
cancellation.section_text_2_4: (ii) Cancellation Request Deadline: All cancellation requests must be submitted within [number of days] days from the date of purchase. Requests submitted after this period will not be honored.
cancellation.section_text_3_1: Cancelled requests may be eligible for a refund if they meet the following:
cancellation.section_text_3_2: (i) Elective issues: You are restricted from accessing course materials.
cancellation.section_text_3_3: (ii) Duplicate Purchases: In the event of two Occidental purchases for the same course, we may extend a refund for the additional purchase.
cancellation.section_text_3_4: All refund requests will be evaluated on a case-by-case basis.
cancellation.section_text_4: If your cancellation request is approved and a refund is processed, the Access Content will theoretically be disputed for your convenience. Please ensure that you have downloaded any required content before requesting a cancellation.
cancellation.section_text_5: Seventy Newer reserves the right to modify or amend this Cancellation Policy at any time. These changes will be effective upon updating our website. It is your responsibility to review the changes.
cancellation.section_text_6_1: If you have any questions or concerns about our cancellation policy or cancellation process, please contact us

about.title: About Us
about.section_text_1: Through us we continue to work with the aim that you can learn and work at your shop. We are enriching our website with quality courses so that everyone can learn the latest updated work and become a successful technician in life.
about.section_text_2: In the light of our experience of more than a century, we will make you a hero from zero in this sector, inshallah. That dream may not be possible in two-one months. You have to give time. But we will learn which one after another, and who to follow, this kind of problem will not exist anymore. . Start to finish, all the support is here. That will help you become an advanced level technician.
about.section_text_3: The course is very old offline but this is the first time online. There are about 200 million mobile users in Bangladesh, but compared to that there are very less mobile servicing technicians. And there is lack of good institutions and skilled trainers to develop skilled technicians. So to develop skilled technicians We have this small system for the purpose. This training can turn your life around. So for those who want to enter this profession for a long time but lack of proper training, your dream remains a dream,
about.section_text_4: That dream will be fulfilled inshallah.
about.section_text_5: Words will show you in deeds, Insha'Allah.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.mainContent: Welcome to the website. We respect your privacy and want to protect your personal information. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use and (under certain conditions) disclose your personal information. This privacy policy is your personal It also explains the steps we take to protect information. Finally, this privacy policy explains your options regarding the collection, use and disclosure of your personal information. By visiting the site directly or through another site, you accept the practices described in this policy. Data Protection A matter of trust and your privacy is important to us. We will therefore only use your name and other information that relates to you in the manner set out in this Privacy Policy. We will only collect information where it is necessary for us to do so and we will only collect information if it is relevant to you. is relevant to our transactions. We will keep your information only as long as we are required by law or relevant to the purpose for which it was collected. We will stop retaining your personal data, or remove the means by which the data may be associated with you, as soon as it is reasonable to assume that such retention no longer serves the purpose for which the personal data was collected, and No longer required for any legal or business purposes. No longer required for any legal or business purposes. All information on this website is disclosed in good faith and for general information purposes only. We make no warranty as to the completeness, reliability and accuracy of this information. You on this website ANY ACTION YOU TAKE ON INFORMATION YOU OBTAIN IS STRICTLY AT YOUR OWN RISK. We will not be responsible for any loss and/or damage related to the use of our website. Please be aware that when you leave our website, other sites may have different privacy policies and terms that are beyond our control. Consent to us By using the Website, you hereby agree to our disclaimer and agree to its terms and conditions.
privacy.SubHeadingOneContent: When you register on our website, when you purchase one of our courses, or visit our website it collects your information. While registering at you will be asked to submit some information that may be personal to you such as first name, last name, mobile number, etc. Once you register and sign in to our website, you will no longer be anonymous to us. Also, you will be asked to provide your contact number at the time of registration and may send SMS, notifications regarding our services to your wireless device. Therefore, by registering you  allow us to use your login information to send you SMS and email alerts and to contact you about other service requirements, including promotional mail and SMS.

subHeadingTwoContent.partOne: To respond to questions or requests submitted by you.
subHeadingTwoContent.partTwo: To process orders or applications submitted by you.

privacy.subHeadingThreeContent: We employ appropriate technical and organizational security measures at all times to protect information collected from you. We have multiple electrical, procedural, and physical safeguards against unauthorized or illegal use or alteration of information and against any accidental loss, destruction, or loss of information. system. However, no method of transmission over the Internet or method of electronic storage is 100% secure. Therefore, we cannot guarantee its absolute security. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality and security of your login ID and password and for providing this information to any third party.

subHeadingFiveContent.partTwo: A. It may take approximately ten days to process your request.
subHeadingFiveContent.partThree: This webite; A third party / service provider / business partner may share your information submitted to the Website without obtaining prior consent from you under the following limited circumstances:
subHeadingFiveContent.partFour: (I). When disclosure is requested or required by law or by any court or government agency or authority for the purpose of identity verification, or for the prevention, detection, investigation of cyber incidents, or prosecution and punishment of crimes. This Disclosures are made in the belief that such disclosure is reasonably necessary to enforce these terms and conditions; to comply with applicable laws and regulations.

withdraw.title: Cancellation Policy
withdraw.mainContent: Thank you for choosing. We understand that you may need to cancel a course or service for any reason. Please review our cancellation policy here as described below.
withdraw.SubHeadingOneContent: We strive to provide you with a smooth learning experience. We understand that plans may change and you may have to cancel your course or service.

subHeadingTwoContent.partOne: To initiate a cancellation, please follow these steps:
subHeadingTwoContent.partTwo: (i) Contact Customer Support: state your full name, order number and which course or service you wish to cancel.
subHeadingTwoContent.partThree: (ii) Cancellation Request Deadline: All cancellation requests must be submitted within [number of days] days from the date of purchase. Requests submitted after this period will not be honored.

subHeadingThreeContent.partOne: Cancelled requests may be eligible for a refund if they meet the following:
subHeadingThreeContent.partTwo: (i) Elective issues: You are restricted from accessing course materials.
subHeadingThreeContent.partThree: (ii) Duplicate Purchases: In the event of two Occidental purchases for the same course, we may extend a refund for the additional purchase.
subHeadingThreeContent.partFour: All refund requests will be evaluated on a case-by-case basis.

withdraw.subHeadingFourContent: If your cancellation request is approved and a refund is processed, the Access Content will theoretically be disputed for your convenience. Please ensure that you have downloaded any required content before requesting a cancellation.
withdraw.subHeadingFiveContent: Seventy Newer reserves the right to modify or amend this Cancellation Policy at any time. These changes will be effective upon updating our website. It is your responsibility to review the changes.
withdraw.subHeadingSixContent: If you have any questions or concerns about our cancellation policy or cancellation process, please contact us. Contact the customer support team.

contact_schedule_text: Find your perfect course with Learning Mangement Sytem. Join our free seminars for expert guidance on choosing the ideal program that aligns with your interests and sets you on a path to exciting career opportunities. Your journey to success begins here.
eligible_slider: Who is eligible for this course
eligible_slider_text: Empower your future with Learning Mangement Sytem. Our courses cater to diverse individuals – employees, housewives, students, and foreign expatriates seeking to enhance skills and pursue independent ventures. Open to ages 14 to 55, our courses require a minimum educational qualification of SSC. Whether you're looking to upskill or embark on a new journey, we have the perfect course for you. Unleash your potential with us.
join_our_free_seminar_text: Find your perfect course with Learning Mangement Sytem. Join our free seminars for expert guidance on choosing the ideal program that aligns with your interests and sets you on a path to exciting career opportunities. Your journey to success begins here.
join_our_free_seminar_text_2: Need guidelines to choose a suitable course? Join our free seminars to consult with our experts, they will guide you to pick the course that matches your interest and discuss the career prospects.
office_section: All our courses are conducted online. But if you want you can know about the course by visiting our office directly.
glorius_years_text: At Learning Mangement Sytem, we are committed to empowering our students with real-world skills that transcend traditional education. Our comprehensive curriculum is designed to take you from the basics to advanced levels, ensuring you not only understand the concepts but can apply them confidently in the dynamic worlds of freelancing and digital marketing.
call_for_admission: Call for any information regarding admission
fb_message: Message us directly on our Facebook page
caution: NOTE: Bikash or Cash on any number other than these numbers will not be accepted. The numbers are 100% correct. So no need to call before sending money. And the following numbers are only Bikash numbers. They do not receive calls.
pay_proof: Take a screenshot of the payment and post it in our Facebook group along with your name, photo, district and payment screenshot. Also upload the screenshot while filling up the admission form.
caution_2: Note: Payment to any number other than this number will not be accepted. The number is 100% correct.
